title: Aceso Bee Propolis | 1000 mg (90 Capsules)
aboutContent: NATURAL IMMUNITY SYSTEM IMPROVEMENT: Bee Propolis is one of the richest sources of bioflavonoids in nature, making it an exceptional natural product that supports our defenses. PURE AND NATURAL: Our propolis capsules are made from high-quality bee propolis extract and are completely free of artificial additives, effectively and naturally supporting the immune system.
descriptionContent: Propolis is a natural bee product obtained from resin that bees collect from buds and trees. It is rich in tree resin, essential oils, and bioflavonoids, whose antioxidant effect can contribute to maintaining a healthy immune system. Each serving provides 1000mg of propolis resin extract, a natural prodigy for overall well-being.
ingredientsContent: 2.5:1 propolis extract, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose (capsule shell), microcrystalline cellulose (bulking agent), magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide (anti-caking agent)
generalInfoContent:
Product Dimensions: 10.5 x 5 x 5 cm; 176.37 g
Units: 90 Count
